attributes.description:
Audi Q5 2.0 tdi Quattro S tronic in pearl white with black leather interior. full house vechile with all the extrasof a pano roof and goose neck tow bar, electric tail gate, gun metal alloys with premium pirelli scorpion tyres, front and rear pdc, tinted safety film, paddle shifts and multi function voice activated steering controls. full service history with spare keys. just had a major service done with cam belt change so nothing to spend .The perfect family SUV offering ecellent performance, safety and yet brilliant economy in this well known diesel motor by AUDI  ..Extended 2-year warranty available to purchase for all vehicles purchased from us.
We can arrange vehicle finance and assist with trade ins.   
Terms and Conditions apply.
Please call Paul on 0829527479  to view by appointment only.

PLEASE NOTE....All our vehicles are priced to sell and exclude on the road fees.

For your Peace of Mind and Ours - We are fully compliant with the Health and Safety measures relating to Covid 19 with all our vehicles fully disinfected after each viewing or test drive, Hand Sanitizer on arrival for all people entering and face masks worn by all. The social distancing rule of 2m is easily adhered to as we have a spacious lot, and it is outdoors too, so call us right away for a comfortable viewing by appointment only.
